about_the_game:
Heroes of Esoria is an action-RPG platformer with influences from the Soulsborne genre and other classic siderscroller games. As one of four heroes, you fight your way through different areas of the world 'Esoria'. Defeat mighty enemies, collect equipment and upgrade it with different materials. Level up and learn various skills to help you save the world from 'Heres', the god of the underworld.

Choose your class
Choose between, 'Crusader', 'Wizard', 'Archer', 'Rogue'. Each class has strengths and weaknesses and a selection of different skills.

Explore the islands of 'Esoria'
Every island in the world of 'Esoria' is different. From sandy deserts to barren, stony cave systems and icy mountains. Explore the environment carefully to uncover every secret.

Equipment and Skills
Equip yourself with a wide variety of items, level up your character and unlock skills. You can also find powerful runes or artifacts in the world of 'Esoria'. Use them to become even more powerful.

Upgrade your equipment
Collect the various materials to strengthen your equipment. Farm the rarest materials to upgrade your equipment to achieve its maximum power.

Play together
Play with your friend on the couch and experience the whole world of 'Esoria' together.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: The Lord of the Underworld is back and the fate of Esoria is in your hands. Take on the role of one of the four heroes, collect powerful equipment, learn various skills and defeat Heres, the god of the underworld.
